posts.post_content:
I am in the process of moving and I have 3  professionally framed items for sale that would go great in your sports room.  Priced at $75 each including shipping.  If someone is interested in all 3, would sell for $199  If you are interested, email me at [url]bdbrownbaseball@gmail.com[/url].  Thanks,  Bill


New York Giant T206 display.  The T206s are reprints, but the postcards of the Polo Grounds are original.  Size 19 x 23

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=194251&d=1434286307[/IMG]

Exhibit display containing beautiful cards of Greenburg, Feller, Williams and Ott.  Size 12 x 26

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=194252&d=1434286331[/IMG]

Life Magazine May 1, 1939 picture of Billy Myers being carried of the field on opening day by his fellow Cincinnati Reds teammates. Size 19 x 23

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=194253&d=1434286351[/IMG]
Prices lowered. If interested, email me at [url]bdbrownbaseball@gmail.com[/url]. Thanks, Bill
